messages.message: on a related note - could we also make "upload files or folders" same format as external storage button. takes a moment to find it, i also clicked external storage first thinking that my mac storage is external :stuck_out_tongue:
think we can make this more intuitive as it will get frequently used
I had the same feedback on the buttons / links being different here. I think they should all look the same.
Can we only show the browse external storage if someone has mounted one?

Re: dialog position - that's correct that the content of the page is slightly offset because it's center with respect to  the sidebar and the dialog is centered with respect to the window. This is expected and we won't change anything here.

Re: the upload buttons - I'll make a note of this but as of right now this has been approved by designers/leadership after a ton of iteration and we won't be making UX tweaks like this in the next week before launch
Also we do only show browse if someone has mounted one - if not it will read connect external storage
@alagu we changed that in this iteration, I can send you the discussion messages a little later
